title: EdEdO eNNI
sahitya:
EdEdO eNNi alaindEn murugA unran pAdAravindam marandEn


anupallavi

  vEdAgamam shollum mElAna param poruL nItAn enrariyAmal vAdADi vINil nAn


caraNam    yAdum aruLbavanum yANDum niraindavanum Odum bala dEivamum unaiyanri vEruNDO 
mAtAvai ninindumE magizhvuDan tirumbiDum maindan enavE vandEn vAvenraNaippAyE
